article_title: Hospitals try to save money treating Medicare patients through new Accountable Care Organizations

article_metadata.description: Editor's note: This is the last of a three-part series.  Community Health Center of Branch County, Hillsdale Hospital along with seven other hospitals and three health care practices have been given $2.4 million over three years to form the Southern Michigan Rural ACO to provide managed health care for Medicare patients.Sturgis, Hillsdale, Three Rivers and Coldwater hospitals formed the ACO with help from the National Rural Accountable Care Consortium, which includes over 250 rural
article_metadata.author: Don Reid
